raw akas.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss

akas: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (original title)
akas from release info: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (original title)

1.title: Family Feud

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Linda is determined to find a wedding dress that tops her sister's. Helana has always dreamt of having a ball gown wedding dress and the rest of the family is on board except for Aunt Kimmie. A special vistor (Henry Roth) stops by for Mandi's fitting.

2.title: The Vision in Your Head

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Ever since Justine was a little girl, she's envisioned walking down the aisle in a gown with a detachable shirt. Sherronda and her two best friends are looking for a dress big enough to match this bride's bold personality. Vera and Jessica disagree.

3.title: Big Bridal Bumps in the Road

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Heather's wedding is taking place on The Love Boat and her dress needs to include feathers.Erin's planning on dropping over 100 pounds before her wedding, but she's eager to find her dress right now. Marissa who encounters a challenge during her fitting.

4.title: To Mom with Love

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Kelly is a plus sized bride who is brash, loud and embraces her full figure. Laura is shopping for a wedding dress even though she doesn't have an engagement ring. After a disastrous start, Amy rips the first dress she tries on.

5.title: Fighting For the Bride

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Plus-sized model Lindsey travelled from St. Louis to find a gown, and she does not want to leave empty handed. Jessica lost weight and is excited to try on dresses to flaunt her new figure. Jennifer decides her $11,000 dress needs some major work.

6.title: Fulfilling the Fantasy

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Lindsey's she's looking for the dresses of all dresses.Katie is having a Batman villain themed wedding and needs a dress in the style of her favorite character, Andrea Beaumont. Meghan is no stranger to fairytale endings.

1.title: Big Love

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Kelly is a plus sized bride who is brash, loud and embraces her full figure. Laura is shopping for a wedding dress even though she doesn't have an engagement ring. After a disastrous start, Amy rips the first dress she tries on.

2.title: Fit to Be a Bride

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Bride Latoya has to find a dress that reduces her to tears. Luna's dream turns into a nightmare, when her "perfect dress" looks awful on her! Jessica returns to the salon excited for her final fitting and realizes her dress is too loose.

3.title: To Thyne Own Self, Be True

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Adhari is a curvaceous shopper who wants a dress to reflect her sassy personality. Nicole is a plus size bride who has her heart set on a gown, but she's worried the dress won't flatter her figure. Elissa bought her dress without even trying it on!

4.title: Expect the Unexpected

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Plus-size bride Carolyn brings a family member whose showroom antics threaten to spoil the afternoon. At size 30, Kris Macklin is one of the largest brides to shop at the salon. Zakia's worried that the dress won't fit because she's gained weight.

5.title: A Wrench in the Works

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Charlene wants simplicity and comfort, but her opinionated wedding planner, sees her in a blinged-out, festive number. Tami already has a dress at home that her mom paid for. With weeks until the wedding day, this has to be Danielle's final fitting.

6.title: Family Matters

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Plus-size bride Ysela's appointment gets hijacked by an opinionated cousin. Kristen wants a romantic lace gown, but her mom and mother-in-law have their own vision. With her family not singing many praises, bride Eliza starts to lose confidence.

1.title: Queen for a Day

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: "Queen" Esther Brandon, the winner of Miss Plus America 2010 pageant, visits the salon. Crystal is looking for a dress where Audrey Hepburn meets Joan Jett. Michelle has her first fitting and despite intending to diet, she hasn't lost the weight.

2.title: You Can't Always Get What You Want

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Sherri, is a former cheerleader shopping with a boisterous entourage. Kathleen is a confident bride with a big personality who wants an over the top dress with feathers. Jill hasn't seen her gown in five months and is thrilled when the gown zips.

4.title: Man vs. Bride

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: The moment plus size bride Telita got engaged, fashion guru brother Ray insisted that they go to Kleinfeld. Mandy catches the eye of designer Henry Roth, whose determined to find her the right gown. Luna brings her wedding planner, James, to the fitting.

5.title: Never Settle for Second Best

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: After rejecting 10 dresses, it's on director of sales Joan to pull something out of the bag for Holly. Danitra wants a black and white wedding dress. The too-big sample Carolyn purchased didn't give her any indication of what her dress would look like.

6.title: The People Closest to You

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Cari is using her appointment as a time to bond with her long lost half sister Cynthia. Brittany wants a ball gown but her family is afraid it will make her look like a cupcake. Romance wants to find a gown that will "knocks her fiancé's socks off."

7.title: Girls, Girls, Girls

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Sam's goal is to find a gown that she loves, and one that all of the sorority sisters will agree on. Jasmine wants to please the whole group, but claims that she'll go against her ladies. Jeannine is worried her friend Stephanie may have a panic attack.

8.title: Obsessed with the Dress

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Megan has been obsessed with being Cinderella and getting married at Disney. Emilie is a '40s pin up style bride who is having a Mexican 'Day of the Dead' themed wedding. Victoria has lost sleep over whether she's made the right dress purchase.

9.title: The Dis-Comfort Zone

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Nervous bride Christy is almost six feet tall and plus size and is so terrified of wedding dress shopping. Plus size opera singer Amanda has come to the store to find a diva dress. Karalee purchased a dress that pushed her outside of her comfort zone.

11.title: Does Size Matter?

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Camille and Randy face the challenge of finding Katy a dress that will both fit and flatter. Misty is looking for a gown that will make her feel beautiful for the first time in her life. With a forty-six G cup, voluptuous bride Niema visits alterations.

12.title: The Power of the Dress

episode of.title: Say Yes to the Dress: Big Bliss (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Zaneta wants a sexy, flirty dress that embraces her curves - just like she does. Alyse is a full-figured bride who has always felt overshadowed by her younger sister.

imdb.plot outline: Follow the emotional journey of plus-size brides as they shop to fulfill their dream dress fantasy in Say Yes To The Dress: Big Bilss. Clients include the winner of Miss Plus America 2010, a former cheerleader, a woman who bought her first dress simply because it fit, a bride who intended to diet but didn't lose the weight, and much more!
